snippet: Rafael Benítez’s winless start as Chelsea’s manager worsened as West Ham came from behind to beat the visiting Blues, 3-1, in England’s Premier League on Saturday.
abstract: West Ham defeats Chelsea, 3-1, in soccer's Premier League.
lead_paragraph: Rafael Benítez’s winless start as Chelsea’s manager worsened as West Ham came from behind to beat the visiting Blues, 3-1, in England’s Premier League on Saturday.

headline.seo: Chelsea Stumbles Again, With 3-1 Loss to West Ham
